resources:
Easy Algebra If Pi is written to two decimal places backwards, it spells pie The fibonacci sequence can often be found in nature. The fibonacci sequence is encoded in the number 1/89 The volume of a Pizza with radius z, and height a is PI × Z × Z × A The word hundred is derived from the word "hundrath", which actually means 120 and not 100. 111,111,111 × 111,111,111 = 12,345,678,987,654,321. In a room of just 23 people there’s a 50% chance that two people have the same birthday. Zero is the only number that can not be represented in Roman Numerals (6 × 9) + (6 + 9) = 69. If you shuffle a pack of cards properly, chances are that exact order has never been seen before in the whole history of the universe. (6 × 9) + (6 + 9) = 69. (Zero is an even number. .999999... = 1 10! seconds is exactly 6 weeks. The word "four" has four letters. the word "forty" is the only number that has all its letters in alphabetical order. The number 5,040 is divisible by exactly 60 different numbers. There are 43,252,003,274,489,856,000 ways to scramble a Rubiks Cube. There are 80,658,175,170,943,878,571,660,636,856, 403,766,975,289,505,440,883,277,824,000,000,000,000 ways to arrange a pack of cards. If you add up the squares of the first seven prime numbers, you get 666. "TWELVE PLUS ONE" is an anagram of "ELEVEN PLUS TWO". 2520 is the smallest number that can be divided perfectly by all numbers from 1 through 10 The equation sign was made by a Welsh Mathematician, who was sick of writing, is equal to. If space is truly infinite then the chances are that there is an exact copy of you elsewhere We live in a 3 dimensional world, but only see in 2 dimensions. Among all 2D shapes with the same perimeter, a circle has the largest area
No more than two decimals>
